TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, they blow your head off

I wish to destroy a Helicopter

Granted. It falls out of the sky and kills you.

Yo dawg, you know I like wishes, so I'm gonna wish for a wish so I can wish while I wish!

Granted. You can now make a wish, only to have it horribly corrupted by a random person on the internet.

I wish to not suck at docking.

Granted, but you fell in a hole and died before the day you docked.

I want a cake

Granted. You become a lie, the cake is mine.

I wish I had some water.

Granted. You are drowning in it

I wish for a wish to wish a wish so I can wish while I wish in my potato wish from before

Granted. You are now in the Pacific Ocean, miles away from land.

EDIT: Ninja'd. Drat! Granted. The wishception destroys you at the molecular level.

I wish for a fantastic voyage.

Edited December 7, 2013 by THENEWJOEMAMA

Granted. Voyage ends in tragedy.

I wish I could be Jack Bauer

Granted. Your name is now Jack Bauer, but you are nothing like the real one.

I wish I wasn't bored.

Granted you are now dead. ( can't be bored if your dead:))

I wish for frosty the snowman!!!!!

Granted, but he is destroyed in a snowball fight.

I wish for a clever bot.

The bot is so clever he makes a mind-controlling device to enslave the whole humanity.

I wish I had a better graphics card...

Granted: it's so awesome modern computers can't recognize it and they cash.

I wish to bet 40 money's on green!

Granted. Green loses.

I wish for nuclear winter. I've been patrolling the Mojave too long.

Granted. It isn't nuclear

I wish that this porridge was juuuuuuust right.

Granted. You are mauled by the three bears you tried to steal porridge from.

I wish EA wasn't a bunch of *insert every expletive in the book*

Granted. They become so nice and trusting they get hacked and taken over by the "explicitive"-heads they fired to become that way.

I wish my Kerbal Space Program space shuttles would actually work well enough for me to start launching payloads into orbit around Kerbin.

Granted. You become so good at it that the devs murder you to keep you from sharing your secrets and replace you with a drunken facsimile. Much like Scott Manley.

I wish my story was true.

Granted, but the universe becomes 10% dumber and aliens from a neighboring universe annihilate ours for being too stupid

I wish the story I just made up never becomes true

Granted, all negative stories you tell now become real.

I wish for my own small personal island near hawaii

Granted. The island is 1x1mm^2. Have fun with that

I wish for potato^4

Granted. Sadly, such a dimension can not exist in a 3D space.

I wish for a lazah!

Granted, it has been stolen

I wish for a fancy hat

Granted. It is made from the skin of an endangered animal. Naturally, that is illegal, and you are sent to jail.

I wish for diplomatic immunity on this forum.

Granted, the forum is now an anarchy.

I wish for an "A"
